Title: QudUx[temporaryfork]
Description:
This is a fork of [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1804499742] egocarib's QudUX[/url], temporary until they come back likely after 1.0.
Works on current stable and beta

[h1]Notes[/h1]
Improved Inventory, Disabling Autopickup, Visited Locations, Trader Restock, Legendary Mark all work (other features are superseded by new basegame changes or removed).

If the last two don't work:

- The marking will work if you [L]ook the legendary once, save to the main menu and continue your save without closing the game.
- Same with the Locate quest givers option. Talk to someone that can tell you if there is quest givers, save to main menu, reload and the option will be there.
You seem to only need to do this once per opening of the game and it will work for all other encounters, but do again if needed.

[url=https://github.com/MoustaphaElPsyCongroo/Gokudera_ElPsyCongroo_CavesOfQud-QudUX-v2_TempFork]Github link of the fork[/url]
